Watch him pound his friend on the classroom examination table before they switch so Anthony can fuck Justin's pre-med hole.  It's a super-sexy anatomy lesson with these two incredibly hot, insatiable dudes, as they 'bone' up with some hands on experience before one of the most important tests of their student careers!Enjoy!
title: Anatomy Lessons
